message_text: The tips you will receive in this programme have been developed by UNICEF, UNHCR, and the Global Initiative to Support Parents.

✅Participating in ParentText is optional. 
✅Your personal information is safe and private. Your name and information will not be public, but your responses will be kept and used by researchers to learn how to support families like yours.  They plan to publish the results. 
❌You can stop when you want. Just type STOP
Press YES if you agree with this. Type "EXIT" if you do not want to participate.
That is wonderful, thank you so much!

Can you please confirm that you are 18 years old or older?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes, I am over 18
2. No, I am under 18
Let's begin.
